abilities.name: Full-Body Bladed Transformation
abilities.description: The user can transform any part of their body into sharp steel blades, making them a Full-Body Bladed Human.

abilities.name: Steel Body Defense
abilities.description: The user's body has the characteristics of steel, making them resistant to most slashing attacks.

abilities.name: Sparkling Daisy
abilities.description: A dual-hand stabbing and slicing combination attack.

abilities.name: Spiral Hollow
abilities.description: Spinning forearm blades functioning as drills for a devastating attack.

abilities.name: Atomic Spurt
abilities.description: High-speed blade attack enhanced by foot-blade momentum.

weaknesses.weakness: Attacks strong enough to cut steel
weaknesses.description: While the user is immune to most blade attacks, any sword strike strong enough to cut steel can slice through the user's body.
The user cannot swim and is vulnerable to Seastone.

keyMoments.description: Sparkling Daisy technique demonstrated in battle against Zoro.
Atomic Spar technique used against Zoro.
Zoro's Shishi Sonson successfully cuts through Mr. 1's steel body, revealing that the fruit's defense can be overcome by attacks strong enough to cut steel.
